answers.answer: The same thing happened to me in my first pregnancy and my baby was healthy, a little early but healthy! Try not to stress, you and the baby will be fine.

question: I learned my blood glucose was abnormal so I have to take a four hour test now to test for gestational diabetes. I was reading online it can cause all kind of negative effects on baby. That he could gain to much weight in his upper body causing problems in labor that could lead to broken bones and brain damage and that he could come out with high or low blood sugars I'm just really worried about him I don't know what to think or do please help!
title: I'm so worried about my baby please help
